section.title: Error 119 - The REXX rxapi queuing system is not available.
Error 120 - The size of the data is incorrect.
section.para: The data supplied to the RXQUEUE command is too long. The RXQUEUE program accepts data records containing 0 - 65472 bytes. A record exceeded the allowable limits.

section.title: Error 121 - Storage for data queues is exhausted.
section.para: The queuing system is out of memory. No more storage is available to store queued data.

section.title: Error 122 - The name %1 is not a valid queue name.
section.para: The queue name contains an invalid character. Only the following characters can appear in queue names:

section.title: Error 123 - The queue access mode is not correct.
section.para: An internal error occurred in RXQUEUE. The RXQUEUE program tried to access a queue with an incorrect access mode. Correct access modes are LIFO and FIFO.

section.title: Error 124 - The queue %1 does not exist.
section.para: The command attempted to access a nonexistent queue.

section.title: Error 131 - The syntax of the command is incorrect.
Error 132 - System error occurred while processing the command.
